nodes.text: Arbor Industries was a scientific research company founded by Jenna Zan Arbor. It produced the antidotes to many deadly diseases that plagued countless worlds—most of which Arbor Industries started itself. Its headquarters were located on Zan Arbor's homeworld of Ventrux, but were shut down when she moved her studies to Simpla-12. It was not completely gone, however, when it was discovered near the end of the Clone Wars that Arbor Industries was behind a deadly gas used to devastate the Naboo moon of Ohma-D'un as well used in Nute Gunray's mechno-chair as an emergency defense mechanism.
